MonitorSet.name: AV - Kaspersky Endpoint Security Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Kaspersky Endpoint Security Services on Kaspersky Endpoint Security machines. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes. Alarms are considered Severity3.

MonitorSet.name: AV - MalwareBytes Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors MalwareBytes Services on MalwareBytes machines. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes. Alarms are considered Severity3.

MonitorSet.name: Database - SQL Server (All Instances) Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors SQL Server Services on SQL Server Servers using wildcard MSSQL* Service. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Database - SQL Server (Default Instance) Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors SQL Server (Default Instance) Performance on SQL Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: SQLServer:General Statistics::User Connections
Counter.description: Displays the number of users connected to the SQL server

Counter.name: SQLServer:Databases::Active Transactions
Counter.description: Displays the number of currently active transactions in the system.

Counter.name: SQLServer:Locks::Average Wait Time (ms)
Counter.description: This is the average wait time in milliseconds to acquire a lock. Lower the value the better it is. If the value goes higher then 500, there may be blocking going on; we need to run blocker script to identify blocking.Average wait time in ms to acquire a lock

Counter.name: SQLServer:Databases::Transactions/sec
Counter.description: Value indicates how active the SQL Server is.

Counter.name: SQLServer:Buffer Manager::Buffer cache hit ratio
Counter.description: Percentage of pages that were found in the buffer pool without having to incur a read from disk.

Counter.name: SQLServer:Memory Manager::Maximum Workspace Memory (KB)
Counter.description: Total amount of memory granted to executing processes. This memory is used primarily for hash, sort and create index operations.

MonitorSet.name: Email - Exchange Client Active Logons QS
MonitorSet.description: Collects Exchange Client Active Logons performance counter on Exchange Servers. Used for Monitor Log display and Reporting purposes only.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS Mailbox::Active Client Logons
Counter.description: The number of active client logons.

MonitorSet.name: Email - Exchange Edge Transport Queues QS
MonitorSet.description: Collects Exchange Edge Transport Queues performance counters on Exchange Servers. Used for Monitor Log display and Reporting purposes only.

Counter.name: MSExchangeTransport Queues::Poison Queue Length
Counter.description: The number of items in the poison queue.

Counter.name: MSExchangeTransport Queues::Unreachable Queue Length
Counter.description: The number of items in the unreachable queue.

Counter.name: MSExchangeTransport Queues::Submission Queue Length
Counter.description: The number of items in the submission queue.

Counter.name: MSExchangeTransport Queues::Aggregate Delivery Queue Length (All Queues)
Counter.description: The number of items queued for delivery in all queues.

Counter.name: MSExchangeTransport Queues::Log Generation Checkpoint Depth
Counter.description: Represents the work, in a count of log files, that will need to be redone or undone to the database files if the process crashes.

Counter.name: MSExchangeTransport Queues::Aggregate Delivery Queue Length (All Queues)
Counter.description: The number of items queued for delivery in all queues.

Counter.name: MSExchangeTransport Queues::Largest Delivery Queue Length
Counter.description: The number of items in the largest delivery queue.

MonitorSet.name: Email - Exchange IMAP4 Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Exchange IMAP4 Service on Exchange Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Email - Exchange POP3 Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Exchange POP3 Service on Exchange Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Email - Exchange Server (Core) Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Exchange Server Performance on Exchange Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::Exchmem: Number of heaps with memory errors
Counter.description: Indicates the total number of exchmem heaps that failed allocations due to insufficient available memory.
Counter.counter: Exchmem: Number of heaps with memory errors

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::Exchmem: Number of memory errors
Counter.description: Indicates the total number of exchmem allocations that could not be satisified by available memory.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::Exchmem: Number of Additional Heaps
Counter.description: Indicates the number of exchmem heaps created by store after startup.

Counter.name: Database::Log Record Stalls/sec
Counter.description: Indicates the Number of log records that cannot be added to the log buffers per second because the log buffers are full.

Counter.name: Database::Log Threads Waiting
Counter.description: Indicates the number of threads waiting to complete an update of the database by writing their data to the log.

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Local Queue Length
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the SMTP queue for local delivery.

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Remote Queue Length
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the SMTP queue for remote delivery.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS Mailbox::Send Queue Size
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the mailbox store's send queue

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS Mailbox::Receive Queue Size
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the mailbox store's recieve queue

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::RPC Requests
Counter.description: Indicates the number of MAPI RPC requests presently being serviced by the Microsoft Exchange Information Store service.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::RPC Averaged Latency
Counter.description: Indicates the RPC latency in ms averaged for the past 1024 packets.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Largest Block Size
Counter.description: Displays the size (in bytes) of the largest free block of virtual memory.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Total 16MB Free Blocks
Counter.description: Displays the total number of free virtual memory blocks that are greater then or equal to 16 MB.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Total Free Blocks
Counter.description: Displays the total number of free virtual memory blocks regardless of size.

Counter.name: MSExchangeIS::VM Total Large Free Block...
Counter.description: Displays the sum in bytes of all the free virtual memory blocks that are greater than or equal to 16 MB.
Counter.counter: VM Total Large Free Block Bytes

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Categorizer Queue Length
Counter.description: Indicates the number of messages in the SMTP queue for DS attribute searches

MonitorSet.name: Email - Exchange Server (Core) Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Exchange Server (Core) Services on Exchange Server (Core) machines. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Email - Exchange Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Exchange Services on Exchange machines. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Email - SMTP Queue Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors SMTP Queue Performance on SMTP Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Local Queue Length
Counter.description: The number of messages in the SMTP queue for local delivery.

Counter.name: SMTP Server::Remote Queue Length
Counter.description: The number of messages in the SMTP queue for remote delivery.

MonitorSet.name: Email - SMTP Server Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors SMTP Server Service on SMTP Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: File / Print - DFSR Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors DFSR/DFS/NTFRS Service on DFSR/DFS/NTFSR machines. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: File / Print - Print Queue Job Errors Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Print Queue Job Errors Performance on File & Print Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: File / Print - Spooler Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Spooler Service on File & Print Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: KNOC.High.Windows.Core.All.Automatic.services

MonitorSet.name: KNOC.MONITOR SET - High CPU Counter
MonitorSet.description: CPU Monitor Set, used to identify Processor issues

MonitorSet.name: KNOC.MONITOR SET - High Memory counter
MonitorSet.description: Memory Monitor Set, used to identify Memory issues

MonitorSet.name: KNOC.noAlarm.AllAutomatic.Services
MonitorSet.description: All Services monitoring only

MonitorSet.name: Network Infrastructure - AD Domain Controller Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors AD Domain Controller Performance on Active Directory Domain Controllers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Inbound Bypes Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the total number of bytes replicated in. It is the sum of the number of uncompressed bytes (never compressed) and the number of compressed bytes (after compression).

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Inbound Objects/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of objects received from neighbors through inbound replication. A neighbor is a domain controller from which the local domain controller replicates locally.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Inbound Values Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the total number of object property values received from inbound replication partners. Each inbound object has one or more properties, and each property has zero or more values. Zero values indicates property removal.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Outbound Bytes Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the total number of bytes replicated out. It is the sum of the number of uncompressed bytes (never compressed) and the number of compressed bytes (after compression).

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Outbound Objects/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of objects replicated out.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Outbound Values Total/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of object property values sent to outbound replication partners.

Counter.name: NTDS::DRA Pending Replication Synchronizations
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory synchronizations that are queued for this server, but not yet processed.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Client Binds/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of Ntdsapi.dll binds per second serviced by this DC.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Directory Reads/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory reads per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Directory Searches/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory searches per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS Directory Writes/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of directory writes per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::KDC AS Requests
Counter.description: Shows the number of Authentication Server (AS) requests serviced by the Kerberos Key Distribution Center (KDC) per second. AS requests are used by client to obtain a ticket-granting ticket.

Counter.name: NTDS::KDC TGS Requests
Counter.description: Shows the number of Ticket Granting Server (TGS) requests serviced by the KDC per second. TGS requests are used by the client to obtain a ticket to a resource.

Counter.name: NTDS::Kerberos Authentications
Counter.description: Shows the number of times per second that clients use a ticket to this DC to authenticate to this DC.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Bind Time
Counter.description: Shows the time, in milliseconds, taken for the last successful LDAP bind.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Client Sessions
Counter.description: Shows the number of currently connected LDAP client sessions.

Counter.name: NTDS::DS % Searches from LDAP
Counter.description: Shows the percentage of directory searches coming from LDAP.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Searches/sec
Counter.description: Shows the rate at which LDAP clients perform search operations.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Successful Binds/sec
Counter.description: Shows the number of LDAP binds per second.

Counter.name: NTDS::LDAP Writes/sec
Counter.description: Shows the rate at which LDAP clients perform write operations.

MonitorSet.name: Network Infrastructure - AD Domain Controller Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors AD Domain Controller Services on Active Directory Domain Controllers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Network Infrastructure - DHCP Server Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors DHCP Server Performance on DHCP Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: DHCP Server::Requests/Sec
Counter.description: Rate of DHCP Requests received by the DHCP server

Counter.name: DHCP Server::Releases/sec
Counter.description: Rate of DHCP Server Releases per second.

Counter.name: DHCP Server::Active Queue Length
Counter.description: The number of packets in the processing queue of the DHCP server

Counter.name: DHCP Server::Duplicates Dropped/sec
Counter.description: This counter monitors the number of duplicate packetsper second dropped by the DHCP server

MonitorSet.name: Network Infrastructure - DHCP Server Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors DHCP Server Service on DHCP Servers.. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Network Infrastructure - DNS Server Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors DNS Server Performance on DNS Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: DNS::Dynamic Update Received/sec
Counter.description: Displays the number of dyanmic updates per second.

Counter.name: DNS::Total Query Received/sec
Counter.description: Displays the total queries recieved per second.

Counter.name: DNS::Total Response Sent/sec
Counter.description: Displays total responses sent per second.

MonitorSet.name: Network Infrastructure - DNS Server Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors DNS Server Service on DNS Servers.. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Network Infrastructure - WINS Server Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors WINS Server Service on WINS Servers.. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Remote Access - Citrix Server Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Citrix Server Services on Citrix Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Remote Access - Citrix Server Session Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Terminal Server Session Performance on Terminal Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: Terminal Services::Active Sessions
Counter.description: Number of active Terminal Services sessions

Counter.name: Terminal Services::Inactive Sessions
Counter.description: Number of inactive Terminal Services sessions

MonitorSet.name: Remote Access - Terminal Server Services QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Terminal Server Services on Terminal Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Remote Access - Terminal Server Session Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors Terminal Server Session Performance on Terminal Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes. Alarms are considered Severity2.

Counter.name: Terminal Services::Active Sessions
Counter.description: Number of active Terminal Services sessions

Counter.name: Terminal Services::Inactive Sessions
Counter.description: Number of inactive Terminal Services sessions

MonitorSet.name: Web Systems - FTP Server Service QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors FTP Server Service on FTP Servers.. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

MonitorSet.name: Web Systems - IIS Performance QS
MonitorSet.description: Monitors IIS Performance on IIS Servers. Used for Monitor Log display, Reporting, and Alerting purposes.

Counter.name: Web Service::Connection Attempts/sec
Counter.description: The rate that connections to the Web service are being attempted.

Counter.name: Web Service::Bytes Total/sec
Counter.description: Bytes Total/sec is the sum of Bytes Sent/sec and Bytes Received/sec.

Counter.name: Web Service::Get Requests/sec
Counter.description: The rate HTTP requests using the GET method are made.

Counter.name: Web Service::Anonymous Users/sec
Counter.description: The rate users are making anonymous connections to the Web service.

Counter.name: Web Service::Current Connections
Counter.description: Current Connections is the current number of connections established with the Web service.

Counter.name: Web Service::NonAnonymous Users/sec)
Counter.description: The rate users are making non-anonymous connections to the Web service.

Counter.name: Web Service::Logon Attempts/sec
Counter.description: The rate that logons to the Web service are being attempted.

Counter.name: Active Server Pages::Request Wait Time
Counter.description: The number of milliseconds the most recent request was waiting in the queue.

Counter.name: Active Server Pages::Requests Rejected
Counter.description: The total number of requests not executed because there were insufficient resources to process them.

MonitorSet.name: Web Systems - IIS Server QS
MonitorSet.description: Collects IIS Server performance counters on IIS Servers. Used for Monitor Log display and Reporting purposes only.

Counter.name: Web Service::Current Connections
Counter.description: This is not really meant to alert it is just to show you a graph of your web sites traffic

Counter.name: Active Server Pages::Requests Rejected
Counter.description: This alert suggests your system resources are iunsufficient, Try checking for memory leaks in your ASP code, restart IIS

Counter.name: Active Server Pages::Requests Queued
Counter.description: This alert suggests your system resources are iunsufficient, Try checking for memory leaks in your ASP code, restart IIS

Counter.name: Internet Information Services Global::Total Files cached
Counter.description: Total number of files whose content was ever added to the cache for WWW and FTP services

Counter.name: Internet Information Services Global::Total Flushed URIs
Counter.description: Total Flushed URIs is the number of URI information blocks that have been removed from the cache since service start up.

Counter.name: Internet Information Services Global::URI Cache Hits
Counter.description: Total number of successful lookups in the URI cache.

Counter.name: Internet Information Services Global::Total URLs Cahced
Counter.description: Total number of URI information blocks ever added to the cache for WWW and FTP services

Counter.name: Internet Information Services Global::URI Cache Misses
Counter.description: Total number of unsuccessful lookups in the URI cache.

Counter.name: Internet Information Services Global::URI Cache Hits %
Counter.description: The ratio of URI Cache Hits to total cache requests.

MonitorSet.name: xPVAL Reporting Server Health
MonitorSet.description: Collects Machine Health performance counters on Windows machines. Used for Monitor Log display and Reporting purposes only.

Counter.name: Processor::% Processor Time
Counter.description: % Processor Time is the percentage of elapsed time that the processor spends to execute a non-Idle thread.

Counter.name: Paging File::% Usage
Counter.description: The amount of the Page File instance in use in percent.

Counter.name: System::System Up Time
Counter.description: System Up Time is the elapsed time (in seconds) that the computer has been running since it was last started.

Counter.name: Memory::% Committed Bytes In Use
Counter.description: % Committed Bytes In Use is the ratio of Memory\\Committed Bytes to the Memory\\Commit Limit.

Counter.name: LogicalDisk::% Disk Time
Counter.description: % Disk Time is the percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive was busy servicing read or write requests.

Counter.name: LogicalDisk::% Disk Time
Counter.description: % Disk Time is the percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive was busy servicing read or write requests.
